text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews You mother fucker ! Who are you to deny our states testing for the coronavirus! You’re a real piece of work Mr. Trump! You don’t care who dies! I’m tired of your same old trickster fucking bullshit like grow up man grow up! Trump doesn’t care about you or me
